item.title: Kali xfce4终端不能用TAB自动补全
item.description: 1、用编辑器打开 /etc/bash.bashrc文件 2、找到文件中的下列代码 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #enable bash completion in interactive shells #if ! shopt -oq posix; then # if [-f /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion ]; then # . /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion # elif [ -f /etc/bash_completion]; then # . /etc/bash_completion # fi #fi 将注释符号#去掉，即改成 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #enable bash completion in interactive shells if ! shopt -oq posix; then if [-f /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion ]; then . /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion elif [ -f /etc/bash_completion]; then . /etc/bash_completion fi fi 3、最后 source一下 /

item.title: Kali安装后合上盖子不休眠问题
item.description: 转载于 https://www.jianshu.com/p/f4f1ba2e92cf 安装工具包： 1 apt-get install pm-utils laptop-mode-tools -y 修改配置文件/etc/laptop-mode/laptop-mode.conf 1 2 3 ENABLE_LAPTOP_MODE_ON_BATTERY=1 #使用电池 ENABLE_LAPTOP_MODE_ON_AC=1 #使用电源 ENABLE_LAPTOP_MODE_WHEN_LID_CLOSED=1 #合上屏幕 重启服务 1 2 /etc/init.d/laptop-mode restart cat /proc/sys/vm/laptop_mode #检查配置 输出不是0就行 THE END 若要设置不休眠 修改 /etc/systemd/logind.conf 1 HandleLidSwitch=ignore 然后重启服务 1 systemctl restart systemd-logind.service

item.title: Nginx使用OpenSSL库报错问题 _ 树莓派折腾日记#3
item.description: 修改Nginx源码 1 vi /usr/local/src/nginx-1.17.10/auto/lib/openssl/conf 找到 1 2 3 4 5 CORE_INCS="$CORE_INCS$OPENSSL/.openssl/include" CORE_DEPS="$CORE_DEPS$OPENSSL/.openssl/include/openssl/ssl.h" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$OPENSSL/.openssl/lib/libssl.a" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$OPENSSL/.openssl/lib/libcrypto.a" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$NGX_LIBDL" 修改为 1 2 3 4 5 CORE_INCS="$CORE_INCS$OPENSSL/.openssl/include" CORE_DEPS="$CORE_DEPS$OPENSSL/include/openssl/ssl.h" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$OPENSSL/lib/libssl.a" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$OPENSSL/lib/libcrypto.a" CORE_LIBS="$CORE_LIBS$NGX_LIBDL" 编译Nginx时指定OpenSSL安装位置 1 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --with-http_auth_request_module --with-http_ssl_module --with-http_v2_module --with-http_gunzip_module --with-pcre --with-pcre-jit --with-threads --with-ipv6 --with-http_realip_module --with-openssl=/usr/local/openssl/lib 1 make && make install Enjoy :)

item.title: OpenSSL编译报错：unknown architecture `armv8-a+crypto' _ 树莓派折腾日记#2
item.description: RT 先说明，本人小白，搞树莓派的OpenSSL头都大了 这特喵是什么神奇的报错 1 unknown architecture `armv8-a+crypto' ?????OpenSSL不支持armv8指令集???? 解决如下 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 cd /usr/src wget https://www.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.1.1g.tar.gz tar -zvxf openssl-1.1.1g.tar.gz cd openssl-1.1.1g ./config no-asm shared zlib --prefix=/usr/local/openssl make depend make #别test了 慢的要死 make install 1 apt-get install libxml2-dev
